params._blocksPerYear: The approximate number of blocks per year
params.baseRatePerYear: The approximate target base APR, as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)
params.jumpMultiplierPerYear: The multiplierPerBlock after hitting a specified utilization point
params.kink_: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied
params.multiplierPerYear: The rate of increase in interest rate wrt utilization (scaled by 1e18)

params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.cash: The amount of cash in the market
params.reserves: The amount of reserves in the market

returns._0: The borrow rate percentage per block as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.cash: The amount of cash in the market
params.reserveFactorMantissa: The current reserve factor for the market
params.reserves: The amount of reserves in the market

returns._0: The supply rate percentage per block as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.cash: The amount of cash in the market
params.reserves: The amount of reserves in the market (currently unused)

returns._0: The utilization rate as a mantissa between [0, 1e18]

baseRatePerBlock().notice: The base interest rate which is the y-intercept when utilization rate is 0

blocksPerYear().notice: The approximate number of blocks per year that is assumed by the interest rate model

getBorrowRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the current borrow rate per block, with the error code expected by the market

getSupplyRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Calculates the current supply rate per block

isInterestRateModel().notice: Indicator that this is an InterestRateModel contract (for inspection)

jumpMultiplierPerBlock().notice: The multiplierPerBlock after hitting a specified utilization point

kink().notice: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied

multiplierPerBlock().notice: The multiplier of utilization rate that gives the slope of the interest rate

utilizationRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the utilization rate of the market: `borrows / (cash + borrows - reserves)`
